devdoc.details: the contract also implements IERC1155Receiver to receive and lock demine nft

params.amounts: Amount of each demine nft token
params.ids: DeMine nft token ids to redeem

devdoc.title: MortgageFacet

adjustDeposit().notice: adjust deposit for msg sender and update account info         Ensure you have a valid start and end set for msg.sender         to prevent infinite loop

payoff().notice: payoff debt from billing. Ensure you have a valid start and         end set for msg.sender to prevent infinite loop

redeem(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Pay token cost and liquidize tokens

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: query whether contract has registered support for given interface

userdoc.notice: Facet contract holding functions for miners to manage mortgage.
